DOC.brief_summary: Nervous , anxiety , fear psychological reaction always appear parturients cesarean section . This study intend investigate effectiveness safety dexmedetomidine combine butorphanol tartrate postoperative analgesia breastfeed caesarean section .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Parturients undergo elective caesarean delivery epidural anaesthesia 2 . ASA I II parturients age 1842 year , singleton gestation . 3 . Parturients verbal write mandarin 4 . Parturients want use PCA intravenous analgesia use pump correctly 5. write informed consent . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Multiple gestation . 2 . A history allergy dexmedetomidine study drug 3 . Cardiovascular disease ( basic HR < 50bpm SBP < 100mmHg ) 4 . Opioid drug abuse . 5 . BMI 35 kg/m2 6 . Conditions preclude spinal anesthesia . 7 . Preeclampsia epilepsy . 8 . A history neuromuscular disease . 9 . Epidural anaesthesia unsuccessful .
